title: Technical Security Training
description: Comprehensive technical security training for ClearTriage's technical team covering cloud security, secure development, monitoring, incident response, recovery, and information spillage procedures.

sections.title: Cloud Security Administration
sections.description: AWS security principles, monitoring tools, configuration management, and credential security for technical staff

sections.title: Secure Development Practices
sections.description: OWASP guidelines, input validation, secrets management, and supply chain security including anti-counterfeit measures

sections.title: Security Monitoring and Response Essentials
sections.description: Identifying security events, evidence preservation, vulnerability management, and incident communication protocols

sections.title: Advanced Incident Response
sections.description: Detection infrastructure, common attack vectors, containment strategies, and eradication procedures for incident response team

sections.title: Technical Recovery Procedures
sections.description: Recovery from backups, technical coordination, and practical runbooks for system restoration

sections.title: Technical Spillage Response
sections.description: Technical procedures for identifying, containing, and eradicating information spillage incidents

notes: Role-based technical training with specific sections restricted to relevant personnel. Section b includes critical anti-counterfeit training for SR-11(1) compliance.
